title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - DLP Analytics and Recommendations to understand risks, improve existing policies and improve posture
description: Microsoft Purview DLP overview page will have two new cards:Â  for DLP with 2 Cards that show Analytics with 1-click recommendations: Highlighting the key risk and the option to create a one-click policy to mitigate the risk, and Recommendation to fine tune existing DLP policies to make them effective and reduce alerts.
